text: University Career Fair 2025 Company: TechNova Inc. Booth: A12 Roles Hiring: Software Engineer Intern, Data Analyst Prep Tip: Review Python, SQL, and data visualization skills. Company: HealthPlus AI Booth: B07 Roles Hiring: Machine Learning Engineer, Backend Developer Prep Tip: Know ML fundamentals and cloud deployment basics. Company: FinEdge Solutions Booth: C19 Roles Hiring: Business Analyst, Full-Stack Developer Prep Tip: Be ready to discuss APIs, databases, and problem-solving.
